headline: Visit The MILL

image-caption: Participants in the CDIL summer symposium 2017
headline: Center for Digital Inquiry & Learning (CDIL)
paragraph: The only center of its kind in Idaho, CDIL provides digital scholarship research and learning opportunities on campus for faculty and students.

image-caption: Posters for Gott's Point and Idaho Queered
headline: Documentary Premiere - Thursday @6:30PM at the Kenorthy
paragraph: Join us the Premiere of JAMM Professor Denise Bennett's Gotts Point, a documentary on the death of Vandal Alum Steven Nelson and for previews of the Idaho Queered Oral History project. Donations at the door.

headline: The Library Has a New Website
paragraph: You are visiting it right now!

headline: Featured Resource: Safari
paragraph: Access thousands of ebooks, videos, and courses in tech, business, communications, design, management, and more with Safari Books Online.

headline: GIS Day @ UIdaho
paragraph: Join us for GIS Day 2018 at the Idaho Commons Nov 15th to discuss geospatial technology and connect with scholars, students, and professionals working with GIS.

image-caption: Participants in the CDIL summer symposium 2017
headline: Center for Digital Inquiry & Learning
paragraph: The only center of its kind in Idaho, CDIL provides digital scholarship research and learning opportunities on campus for faculty and students.

headline: Native American Heritage Month
paragraph: Honor Native American Heritage Month by exploring some of our featured historical resources such as Indigenous Peoples: North America, American Indian Histories & Cultures, and U.S. History in Context.

headline: The Library Now Has Board Games!
paragraph: Need a study break? Take home one of the library's new board games! Find them on the first floor of the library by the magazines.

headline: Featured Resource: The Vogue Archive
paragraph: Start your semester in style... browse more than 100 years of Vogue magazine online!
